name: IBM Cloud Private Multi-Node Installation on OpenStack
description: This template will deploy a Multi-Node instance of IBM Cloud Private on OpenStack

metadata.displayName: HA Node Deployment of IBM Cloud Private on OpenStack
metadata.longDescription: This template will deploy a Multi-Node instance of IBM Cloud Private on OpenStack

bullets.title: Topology
bullets.description:
HA Node Virtual Machine (11 VMs)
Virtual Machine 1 : IBM Cloud Private Boot Node
Virtual Machine 2/3/4 : IBM Cloud Private Master Nodes
Virtual Machine 5/6 : IBM Cloud Private Proxy Nodes
Virtual Machine 7/8/9 : IBM Cloud Private Worker Nodes
Virtual Machine 10 : IBM Cloud Private Vulnerability Node
Virtual Machine 11 : IBM Cloud Private NFS Server Node

bullets.title: Usage and Special Notes
bullets.description:
1. The user is responsible for obtaining appropriate software licenses and downloads prior to template deployment.
2. IBM Knowledge Center for IBM Cloud Private - https://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/en/SSBS6K/product_welcome_cloud_private.html
3. IBM Support Portal - https://www.ibm.com/support/home/
